--------------------------------------------------------------------
section
Let's Keep In Touch
article
We want to hear from you. Communicating with our guests and the local Southwest Florida community is essential in successfully providing the highest level of customer service before, during, and after your stay at Sundial Beach Resort & Spa.
/article
WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU
Subject
*
Subject
Corporate Events
Special Events
Weddings
Reservations
General Inquiries
Name
*
Email
*
Phone
*
Questions of Comments
CAPTCHA
Name
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
right col
--------------------------------------------------------------------
CONTACT US
Email:
info@SundialResort.com
Phone:
239.472.4151
1451 Middle Gulf Drive
Sanibel,
                                FL
33957
FAQS
WHAT MAJOR CREDIT CARDS ARE ACCEPTED?
We proudly accept Visa, Master Card, Discover and American Express for payment.
DO YOU ALLOW PETS AT SUNDIAL?
The resort does not allow pets. As per Florida Statute 413.08, the provision of emotional support, well-being, comfort or companionship does not constitute work or tasks for the purpose of the definition of a service animal.  Therefore, emotional support animals are not covered under the statute and are not permitted at Sundial Beach Resort & Spa. Only service animals as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act are permitted. (Please note: Any disregard of this policy may result in the party being asked to leave with no refund made, and a cleaning fee charge of $500.)
WHAT PARKING SERVICES ARE PROVIDED?
Complimentary off-street parking is provided for one vehicle.  A pass will be issued and must be hung from your rearview mirror with the information side facing out.  Vehicles must fit in the parking space. Boat trailers, campers, travel trailers, motor homes and recreational vehicles are prohibited. Please note that there are no designated EV charging stations on property and EV charging is not permitted. EV charging is available at the Sanibel Captiva Chamber of Commerce located at 1159 Causeway Blvd.
WHAT DOES THE RESORT FEE INCLUDE?
Fitness center, main resort pool, hot tub, beach chairs, umbrellas & beach towels, resort activities and games, tennis court time and equipment, pickleball court time and equipment, beach volleyball court time and equipment, bicycles, kayaks, paddleboards, wifi, parking
ARE RESORT AMENITIES AVAILABLE TO THOSE NOT STAYING THROUGH SUNDIAL BEACH RESORT & SPA?
Resort amenities are exclusively for the use of registered guests at Sundial Beach Resort & Spa. Restaurants, bars, HydroGrid tennis courts, pickleball courts, Kay Casperson Lifestyle Spa and Boutique, and Marketplace are available to non-Resort guests. (Fees may apply.)
WHAT IS THE MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENT FOR RESORT CHECK-IN?
The primary guest must be at least 21 years of age.
WHAT ARE THE FITNESS CENTER HOURS?
The Fitness Center is open daily from 7:00 am - 10:00 pm.
WHERE IS THE CLOSEST HOSPITAL LOCATED?
HealthPark Hospital is located approximately 12 miles away at 9981 S. Healthpark Drive in Ft Myers; 239 343 3695. Convenient Care information may be found at https://www.leehealth.org/
HOW FAR IS THE RESORT LOCATED FROM SOUTHWEST FLORIDA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (RSW)?
26 miles
DOES THE RESORT OFFER AIRPORT TRANSPORTATION?
The resort does not offer transportation. However, several transportation companies service the island including
Island Taxi
,
Sanibel Doubled
,
Sanibel Taxi
, and
Dolphin Naples
.
WHAT TIME IS CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT?
Check in begins at 4:00 pm. Check out is by 11:00 am.
WHAT HOUSEKEEPING SERVICES ARE PROVIDED?
Your unit will be serviced every third day of your stay. Guests may contact the front desk to refresh towel, coffee and bathroom amenities. Linens will be changed weekly. Additional servicing is available upon request for a fee.
DO I NEED A LICENSE TO FISH?
For information, please visit
Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission
. Locally, you may purchase a license at several island businesses including the main Bailey’s General Store (Tarpon Bay & Periwinkle) or The Bait Box (Periwinkle).
ARE LAUNDRY FACILITIES AVAILABLE AT THE RESORT?
Coin operated laundry facilities are available in accommodation buildings. For locations, please call the front desk.
HOW DO I APPLY FOR EMPLOYMENT AT SUNDIAL?
We invite all interested applicants to apply by visiting
Sundial Careers
.
/section

section
MEET ISLAND STYLE
article
Sundial Beach Resort & Spa, voted Best Event Facilities on Sanibel & Captiva Islands, is the premier location for your next meeting. Boasting state-of-the-art meeting facilities, award-winning service, stunning Gulf views, and a bevy of activities, meeting with us is guaranteed value.
/article
/section
MEET ISLAND STYLE
article
Sundial Beach Resort & Spa, voted Best Event Facilities on Sanibel & Captiva Islands, is the premier location for your next meeting. Boasting state-of-the-art meeting facilities, award-winning service, stunning Gulf views, and a bevy of activities, meeting with us is guaranteed value.
/article
Sundial Beach Resort & Spa, voted Best Event Facilities on Sanibel & Captiva Islands, is the premier location for your next meeting. Boasting state-of-the-art meeting facilities, award-winning service, stunning Gulf views, and a bevy of activities, meeting with us is guaranteed value.
MEET AND BE REWARDED
$500 Amex Gift Card
Complimentary meeting space (based on qualifying food & beverage)
Complimentary wifi in meeting rooms and sleeping rooms
Complimentary parking
*Gift card offer subject to rooms and food and beverage minimums. Valid on new bookings only. Restrictions and black-out dates apply. May not be combined with any other offer.

section
/section
EVENTS IN A TIMELESS NATURAL SETTING
Voted the Best Event Facilities on Sanibel & Captiva Islands, Sundial offers an array of venues including indoor spaces with breathtaking Gulf views, fully-equipped board rooms, tropical gardens, private beach areas, and outdoor terraces. Whether it’s a corporate function or retreat, wedding, or special event, our award-winning team will provide the highest quality of service in the planning and implementation of your event.
Voted the Best Event Facilities on Sanibel & Captiva Islands, Sundial offers an array of venues including indoor spaces with breathtaking Gulf views, fully-equipped board rooms, tropical gardens, private beach areas, and outdoor terraces. Whether it’s a corporate function or retreat, wedding, or special event, our award-winning team will provide the highest quality of service in the planning and implementation of your event.
Weddings
Say “I Do” to the Gulf-front wedding of your dreams. At Sundial Beach Resort & Spa, we know how to transform your vision into the celebration of a lifetime. Our serene resort is beautifully located on a barrier island with white sand beaches and picture-perfect sunsets. Whether you envision an intimate beach ceremony or a grand ballroom affair, we will make your dreams come true.
Learn More
Corporate Events
Plan your next corporate event or meeting in one of our resort’s nine meeting rooms housed with comprehensive audiovisual capabilities. Sundial Beach Resort & Spa’s meeting facilities include 20,000 square feet of combined, flexible indoor/outdoor meeting and event space – the only destination on the Florida Gulf Coast of Sanibel Island capable of accommodating up to 250 guests.
Learn More
Special Events
Special moments should be celebrated in special places. Sundial Beach Resort & Spa’s expansive event facilities include over 20,000 square feet of combined, flexible indoor and outdoor event and meeting space, capable of accommodating up to 250 guests. Whether you are celebrating time, love, age or life, our event professionals will help you plan and organize every detail of your next special event.
Learn More
